resources.app_description: Dizajnirana za sustav Windows, aplikacija Bing omogućuje vam kontrolu vršcima prstiju. Bilo da želite dodirnuti i prevući prstom ili kliknuti i tipkati, pomoću aplikacije Bing jednostavnije ćete pronaći potrebne informacije te izvršiti ključne zadatke.
resources.error_argument_null_or_undefined: Null or undefined passed for "{0}" argument
resources.error_invalid_operation: "{0}" operation is invalid within current context
resources.error_relay_blank_message_name: Error while relaying from app to web: msgName was blank.
resources.error_navigation_path: Failed to find view mapping for "{0}"
resources.error_must_override: {0} method must be overriden in derived class
resources.error_unhandled_navigation_uri: Navigation path not handled by iframehost: {0}.
resources.error_view_must_be_loaded: "{0}" must have been loaded by now
resources.error_must_be_loading_view: "{0}" must be in the process of being loaded
resources.error_view_not_registered: "{0}" is not found in view registry
resources.error_page_network_error_message: Nismo sigurni što se dogodilo. Pokušajte ponovo za nekoliko minuta.
resources.error_error_page_in_app_context: Error page loaded inside app compartment
resources.settings_safesearch_description: Filtrirajte sadržaj za odrasle iz svojih rezultata pretraživanja.
resources.settings_safesearch_filter_moderate_desc: Iz svojih rezultata pretraživanja filtrirajte slike i videozapise za odrasle, no ne i tekst.
resources.settings_safesearch_filter_off_descripti: Bez filtriranja sadržaja za odrasle iz rezultata pretraživanja.
resources.settings_safesearch_filter_strict_descri: Filtrirajte tekst, slike i videozapise za odrasle iz rezultata pretraživanja.
resources.settings_searchhistory_clear_description: Napominjemo da se ova radnja ne može poništiti.
resources.settings_link_tou: Ugovor o pružanju usluga tvrtke Microsoft
resources.tou_serviceagreement: Ugovor o pružanju usluga tvrtke Microsoft
resources.error_navigation_completed_called_before: NavigationManager.notifyNavigationCompleted call must be preceeded by calling NavigationManager.notifyNavigationStarted method
resources.error_navigation_started_called_from_inv: NavigationManager.notifyNavigationStarted can be called only if navigation manager is in idle state
resources.error_navigation_message_payload_must_co: Navigation message posted by web compartment must contain uri
resources.error_unhandled_bing_uri: Bing path not handled by iframehost: {0}.
resources.error_description_restart: Nismo sigurni što se dogodilo, ali morate ponovo pokrenuti aplikaciju.
resources.error_description_tryagain: Nismo sigurni što se dogodilo. Pokušajte ponovo za nekoliko minuta.
resources.error_description_outofdate: Ove su informacije zastarjele. Provjerite internetsku vezu. Ako radi, pokušajte ponovo za nekoliko minuta.
resources.error_description_topicexists: Ta tema već postoji. Unesite neki drugi naziv.
resources.topics_search_and_share: Kada tijekom pretraživanja pronađete relevantna web-mjesta, možete ih objaviti u ovoj temi.
resources.start_already_exists: Tema s ovim nazivom već postoji.
resources.start_delete_permanently: Želite li trajno izbrisati ovu temu?
resources.start_set_as_lock: Postavi kao sliku za zaključani zaslon
resources.start_max_topics_reached: Dosegnuli ste maksimalni broj tema. Izbrišite neke stare teme pa pokušajte ponovo.
resources.update_version_out_of_date: Vaša je verzija aplikacije Bing App zastarjela.
resources.update_download: Da biste preuzeli najnoviju verziju, posjetite Windows trgovinu.
resources.trending_error: Želite više naslova? Aplikacija Bing Vijesti će se pobrinuti za to.
resources.error_array_data_provider_item_must_be_i: Item with key value '{0}' must be inside array.
resources.error_array_data_provider_item_must_have: Cannot add item with duplicate key value.
Cannot add item which key value is not a string.
resources.error_local_storage_data_provider_item_m: Cannot add item with duplicate key value.
Cannot add item which key value is not a string.
Item with key value '{0}' must be inside local storage
resources.error_event_listener_must_have_callback_: Event listener object must have 'callback' or 'iframeId' member defined.
resources.error_listener_must_not_have_explicit_so: Listener object must not have explicitly defined 'source' when registering to handle event for EventSource-derived object
resources.error_content_loaded_called_from_invalid: NavigationManager.notifyContentLoaded can be called only if content is in loading state
